channel.title: Alison Kermes on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Bipolar Scotland
item.description: MM - Michael McEwan AK - Alison Kermes MM Okay now on Iriss.fm, I’m going to be talking to Alison Kermes, now Alison is the Chief Executive and the Company Secretary for a Scottish Mental Health charity called Bipolar Scotland so thanks Alison for giving up your time. Now the first question I really want to ask is what is bipolar? AK Bipolar is a serious mental illness, it affects 2 to 3% of the population and the symptoms include mood swings…extreme mood swings from, you know, serious depression to mania, psychosis.
